column1: Add your custom comments here to appear at the bottom of the Invoice Pdf. You could for example include bank account number and terms of payment.
column2: Tilføj dine egne kommentarer som skal fremgå i bunden af fakturaer. Eksempelvis bank konto nr. og betalingsbetingelser.

column1: Add your custom comments here to appear at the bottom of the Creditmemo Pdf
column2: Tilføj din egen kommentar til bunden af kreditnotaer

column1: Add your custom comments here to appear at the bottom of the Shipment Pdf
column2: Tilføj dine egne kommentarer som skal fremgå i bunden af følgesedler

column1: Choose Helvetica, Times or Courier for smaller filesizes. Choose the Dejavu-Variants to support more characters (UTF-8).
column2: Vælg Helvetica, Times eller Courier for at få mindre filstørrelser. Vælg Dejavu-Varianter for at undstøtte flere tegnsæt (UTF-8).

column1: Which addresses should appear on the Credit Memo? Please note that downloadable product orders don't have a shipping address.
column2: Hvilke adresser skal fremgå på kreditnotaer? Bemærk at ordrer på downloadede produkter ikke har en forsendelsesadresse.

column1: Which addresses should appear on the invoice? Please note that downloadable product orders don't have a shipping address.
column2: Hvilke adresser skal fremgå på fakturaer? Bemærk at ordrer på downloadede produkter ikke har en forsendelsesadresse.

column1: Which addresses should appear on the packing slip? Please note that downloadable product orders don't have a shipping address.
column2: Hvilke adresser skal fremgå på følgesedler? Bemærk at ordrer på downloadede produkter ikke har en forsendelsesadresse.

column1: Copy the contents of your certificate/signature file including your private key here. Include everything from -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- to -----END CERTIFICATE-----
column2: Kopier indholdet af dit certifikat/signatur fil inklusiv din private nøgle her. Inkluder alt fra -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- til -----END CERTIFICATE-----

column1: Which addresses should appear on the order? Please note that downloadable product orders don't have a shipping address.
column2: Hvilke adresser skal fremgå på ordren? Bemærk at ordrer på downloadede produkter ikke har en forsendelsesadresse.

column1: Add your custom comments here to appear at the bottom of the Order Pdf.
column2: Tilføj din egen kommentar til bunden af ordrer

column1: Displays the date of the invoice again. Needed in some jurisdictions.
column2: Displays the date of the invoice again. Needed in some jurisdictions.

column1: Use this option if you would like to print packing slips without having to create shipments. You will however loose the ability to print the packing slips with the shipment number (the order number is used instead).
column2: Use this option if you would like to print packing slips without having to create shipments. You will however loose the ability to print the packing slips with the shipment number (the order number is used instead).

column1: Logo top-left Corner from the left
column2: Logo top-left Corner from the left

column1: Logo top-left Corner from the top
column2: Logo top-left Corner from the top

column1: Displays as part of the billing address.
column2: Displays as part of the billing address.

column1: is only effective if Tax > Orders, Invoices, Creditmemos Display Settings > Prices is set to not display taxes
column2: is only effective if Tax > Orders, Invoices, Creditmemos Display Settings > Prices is set to not display taxes

column1: Display Background only on first page
column2: Display Background only on first page

column1: Display Salesrule instead of Coupon Code
column2: Display Salesrule instead of Coupon Code

column1: Combines Gift Wrapping for Orders, Items and Printed Cards
column2: Combines Gift Wrapping for Orders, Items and Printed Cards

column1: Please make sure the barcode type is appropriate for the content or the pdf generation might fail (Default: CODE 39 EXTENDED + CHECKSUM).
column2: Please make sure the barcode type is appropriate for the content or the pdf generation might fail (Default: CODE 39 EXTENDED + CHECKSUM).

column1: Double - Shipping with Store Addresses and Image
column2: "Double - Shipping with Store Addresses and Image"
